    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int reservationCode,
                   Guest guestName,
                   ReservationRoom reservationRoom,
                   java.lang.String billing,
                   java.time.LocalDate checkIn,
                   java.time.LocalDate checkOut,
                   int noAdults,
                   int noChildren,
                   java.time.LocalTime scheduledTime,
                   boolean walkIn,
                   java.lang.String reservationStatus)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of Reservation() Create a new reservation with the given reservation code, guest name, reservation room, bill, check-in date, check-out date, number of adults, number of children, scheduled check-in time, walk-in , and reservation status
        Parameters:
        reservationCode - The reservation code of the guest
        guestName - The guest making the reservation
        reservationRoom - The room of the reservation
        billing - The bill of the reservation
        checkIn - The check-in date of the reservation
        checkOut - The check-out date of the reservation
        noAdults - The number of adults in the reservation
        noChildren - The number of children in the reservation
        scheduledTime - The scheduled check-in time of the reservation
        walkIn - The method used to make a reservation true means guest walked in to make a reservation false means guest booked online to make a reservation
        reservationStatus - The status of the reservation reservation Reservation status of a guest can be confirmed, in waiting list, checked in, or expired
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception

        Constructor of Reservation() Create a new empty reservation
